column1: Table A-89:  NOx Emissions from Stationary Combustion (kt)
a Other Fuels include LPG, waste oil, coke oven gas, coke, and non-residential wood (EPA 20145).
b Residential coal, fuel oil, and natural gas emissions are included in the Other Fuels category (EPA 2015b).
Note:  Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.
